description: A React functional component named Square that renders a clickable button representing a game square, such as in a tic-tac-toe game. It visually displays a symbol ('Knight' or 'Queen') based on the value, with accessibility features and styling for highlights.

methods.name: renderMarkerIcon
methods.description: Returns icon, className, and aria label based on the value ('X', 'O', or null).

calls: React.js functions for rendering and event handling
